paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The sister was found to carry the variant as well.
She tested negative for the variant, which provides additional support to the hypothesis of pathogenicity.

functional_data.summary: In silico evaluations supported a pathogenic effect.

variants.segregation_data: Cosegregation ratio in this family was ≥2 (2–2.63) with all the methods adopted.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is located in a consensus splice site.
key_quotes: the nucleotide c.7975 is located in a consensus splice site and bioinformatic tool predicted splice site alteration.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The mother was found to carry both the variants, thus excluding a role for them in breast cancer clustering.

functional_data.summary: Cosegregation analysis supports the neutrality of both the variants.
